Richard "Dick" Clapp bụ ọkà mmụta ọrịa na-efe efe nke America bụ Prọfesọ Adjunct na Mahadum Massachusetts Lowell na Prọfesọ Emeritus nke Ahụike Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na Boston University School of Public Health. Clapp bụ onye isi na ndekọ ndekọ ọrịa kansa Massachusetts site na 1980 ruo 1989 na onye isi oche nke ndị dibia bekee nke Boston maka Ọrụ Ọha.

Clapp nwetara nzere bachelọ na bayoloji na Dartmouth College (1967) M.P.H., na ọrụ ahụike na Harvard School of Public Health (1974), ma nata D.Sc., Epidemiology, na Boston University School of Public Health (BUSPH) na 1989.  Ọ malitere nkuzi na BUSPH na 1992 dịka onye enyemaka Prọfesọ nke ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi

N'afọ'afọ 2004, Clapp ghọrọ "onye ọkà mmụta sayensị ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi na Lowell Center for Sustainable Production na Mahadum Massachusetts-Lowell, ebe ọ na-eduzi ma na-elekọta nyocha data gbasara ọrịa, nyocha akwụkwọ, na enyemaka teknụzụ na ọmụmụ ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi
Ihe nrite ya gụnyere ịkpọ aha 2001 "Onye ọkà mmụta sayensị ọha nke afọ" nke Association for Science in the Public Interest, ,  na 2018 Alumni Award of Merit sitere na Harvard T.H
Chan School of Public Health's Alumni Association.
